channel.title: The Unicorn on 2ynhub's Hugo Blog
channel.description: Recent content in The Unicorn on 2ynhub's Hugo Blog

item.title: The Unicorn S02E12 영어 표현
item.description: 1. fast 단식하다, 절식하다; 금식하다. - Wade: Aren’t you supposed to fast when you have a colonoscopy? 2. account 이유. - Michelle: Look, I know you’re trying to be nice to Meg on my account, but you don’t have to be. 3. break off sth to end a relationship. - Wade: I mean, I know we did the right thing be breaking it off. 4. clean as a whistle extremely clean.

item.title: The Unicorn S02E08 영어 표현
item.description: 1. give off 풍기다. - Jared: Uh, this is a liability release form. I need you and your husband to sign it. - Shannon: What? Him? - Wade: Yo-You thought that we were together? - Shannon: That’s so funny. No, no, no, no, no. - Wade: No, we’re not together. I mean, we came here together, but we’re not married or anything. - Shannon: Do we give off that vibe?

item.title: The Unicorn S02E06 영어 표현
item.description: 1. flat out 딱 부러지게, 완전히. - Cynthia: And I love his family and his dogs, but I told him flat out, I won’t do that with Butch in the room. 2. ill at ease feeling anxious and not relaxed. - Wade: Yeah, uh, Forrest got a deal online, but they make him nervous. - Forrest: Nah, more ill at ease, let’s say. 3. get off on the right/wrong foot to make a successful/unsuccessful start in something.
